content.en: Cache optimization: Researchers are exploring ways to improve the performance of web caching systems by integrating cache replacement and consistency algorithms, recognizing and exploiting regularities in traffic patterns, and using statistical parameters for replacement policies. They are also investigating the use of history-based caching schemes, probabilistic methods, and incorporating expiration time in web caching algorithms. Additionally, researchers are studying the optimal storage capacities for web caches, designing efficient cache replacement policies based on correlations in web request traces, and exploring trade-offs in designing caching systems for web search engines. These algorithms aim to improve cache hit rates, network traffic, and response time in web caches.
content.da: Cache-optimering: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre ydeevnen af web-caching-systemer ved at integrere cache-udskiftnings- og konsistensalgoritmer, genkende og udnytte regelmæssigheder i trafikmønstre samt bruge statistiske parametre til udskiftningspolitikker. De undersøger også brugen af historiebaserede caching-ordninger, probabilistiske metoder og inkorporering af udløbstid i web-caching-algoritmer. Derudover studerer forskere de optimale lagerkapaciteter for web-caches, designer effektive cache-udskiftningspolitikker baseret på korrelationer i web-anmodningsspor og udforsker afvejninger i design af caching-systemer til websøgemaskiner. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre cache-hit-rater, netværkstrafik og svartider i web-caches.
